Citation/Acknowledgement

Citation

If you use this package in your research, please cite:

Acknowledgement

This package benefits from the open-source Gepard package!

Researches related to this package is supported by the U.S. Department of Energy, Office of Science, Office of Nuclear Physics, under contract number DE-SC0020682, and the Center for Nuclear Femtography, Southeastern Universities Research Association, Washington D.C. The authors also acknowledge partial support by the U.S. Department of Energy, Office of Science, Office of Nuclear Physics under the umbrella of the Quark-Gluon Tomography (QGT) Topical Collaboration with Award DE-SC0023646.
